ovdesc.p: This file is updated with particulars of the list of applications that do not require transaction capture and play.

desc.p: The application and service names to omit capture/play on them. ie., When a transaction is input into this application, that will not be captured. The setup will differ for capture and play.
ID must be given as SYSTEM. No other values will be accepted. It denotes the list of applications that does not require transaction capture and not required to play too.
Help Text for this field is unavailable. Please refer to the T24 User Guides for further information.
